metadata.name: The City no.2 #1
metadata.description:
A major theme in Lee Jin Hyu’s works is ‘The Fragmentary Thoughts.’ The artist combines the past and the present from a very humanistic dimension rather than a national or historical figure. The way of contemporary society and the aesthetic point of view reflected through his diverse prospective has a greater value and significance at a time when the global era of contemporary art is predicted. 

#NFTart  #red    #city  #Picasso  #physical-based
